last_episode_to_air.name: Flamingo A-Go-Go
last_episode_to_air.overview: At the Zoo, a flock of flamingoes protects Jerry and Tuffy from Tom.

name: Tom and Jerry in New York
original_name: Tom and Jerry in New York
overview: Follow the iconic cat and mouse duo as they settle in to their new digs at the Royal Gate Hotel and unleash mayhem across the big city, inciting hilarious chaos uptown, downtown and everywhere their manic escapades take them.

episodes.name: Put a Ring On It
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry storm a department store after dark.

episodes.name: Come Fly with Me
episodes.overview: Jerry befriends a pigeon.

episodes.name: Bubble Gum Crisis
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry battle for a bag of gumballs.

episodes.name: Mousequerade
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry babysit a troublesome panda.

episodes.name: Museum Peace
episodes.overview: Jerry helps an elephant escape from the museum.

episodes.name: Here Kite-y Kite-y
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry take kites to the park.

episodes.name: Street Wise Guys
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry disrupt street performers throughout the city.

episodes.name: Chameleon Story
episodes.overview: A pet chameleon disappears after breaking free at the hotel.

episodes.name: Telepathic Tabby
episodes.overview: In an attempt to trick Tom out of food, Butch predicts the future.

episodes.name: Shoe-In
episodes.overview: Jerry helps save a shoe repair shop.

episodes.name: It's a Gift
episodes.overview: Tom is on a mission to keep Jerry away from the gift shop snack aisle.

episodes.name: Stormin' the Doorman
episodes.overview: Tom is on a mission to avoid the hotel's energetic new doorman

episodes.name: The Great Donut Robbery
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry mistake a burglar's loot for a bag of donuts.

episodes.name: Torpedon't
episodes.overview: Aquatic mayhem ensues at the park.

episodes.name: Billboard Jumble
episodes.overview: Tom chases Jerry through a series of surreal billboards.

episodes.name: Horticulture Clash
episodes.overview: Spike goes overboard trying to make up for manhandling Tom.

episodes.name: Room Service Robots
episodes.overview: A troop of robot bellhops cause trouble.

episodes.name: Coney Island Adventure
episodes.overview: Nightmares come true at a seaside amusement park after dark.

episodes.name: Scents and Sensibility
episodes.overview: After Jerry spritzes him with a fetching perfume, Tom becomes canine catnip.

episodes.name: Wrecking Ball
episodes.overview: Tom chases Jerry into a building marked for demolition.

episodes.name: Cat Hair
episodes.overview: A hotel VIP wants Tom groomed before babysitting her prized pet.

episodes.name: Shhh!
episodes.overview: Tom sneaks into a library to catch Jerry.

episodes.name: Torched Song
episodes.overview: Jerry helps Tom rival Butch in a snazzy musical fantasy.

episodes.name: Quacker's Lucky Penny
episodes.overview: Tom has bad luck in the park.

episodes.name: Ready Teddy
episodes.overview: Spike's teddy bear is accidentally ruined while the hotel manager is on vacation.

episodes.name: Swiss Cuckoo
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry stow away on the concierges' vacation.

episodes.name: Dream Team
episodes.overview: Tom dreams of a basketball championship.

episodes.name: Private Tom
episodes.overview: Tom's militaristic uncle is determined to help him permanently defeat Jerry.

episodes.name: Top of the Heap
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry compete against tricky rats on a trash barge.

episodes.name: Stunt Double Trouble
episodes.overview: A “stage cat” stunt double replaces Tom.

episodes.name: Surfer Supreme
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry have a musical surf-off at the Jersey Shore.

episodes.name: Kabuki Cat
episodes.overview: Upon his return to Japan, a Kabuki actor finds Tom and Jerry in his luggage.

episodes.name: Too Much Monkey Business
episodes.overview: Tom keeps a VIP chimp from the hotel’s bananas.

episodes.name: Doggie Championship
episodes.overview: Jerry is the secret weapon in a dog contest, while Tom takes Spike’s place.

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: A musical snow frolic on a City winter’s day.

episodes.name: Toots the Terrible
episodes.overview: Toots wants to catch Jerry to spend more time with Tom.

episodes.name: The Spa’s the Limit
episodes.overview: Jerry and Tuffy ruin Tom and Spike’s spa day.

episodes.name: The Hair Dignitary
episodes.overview: Tom trades places with a diplomat's cat.

episodes.name: Year of the Mouse
episodes.overview: A musical visit to Chinatown spells romance for Jerry – and fireworks for Tom.

episodes.name: Relativity
episodes.overview: Tom stalks Jerry’s jolly Bavarian cousins during their stay at the Hotel.

episodes.name: Cat and Mouse Burglars
episodes.overview: A perky – and thieving – pop star checks into the Hotel!

episodes.name: Caterpillar and Mouse
episodes.overview: Tom’s coveted flower has a secret stowaway.

episodes.name: The Pied Piper of Harlem
episodes.overview: A jazzy song punctuates Tom and Jerry’s waiter rivalry.

episodes.name: Lazy Jerry
episodes.overview: An R.C. toy mouse distracts Tom – but makes for a dangerously lazy Jerry.

episodes.name: To Your Health
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry keep the hotel clean for the health inspector.

episodes.name: Golf Brawl
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry go wild in an indoor mini-golf park.

episodes.name: Tom's Swan Song
episodes.overview: A protective swan befriends Jerry.

episodes.name: King Spike the First and Last
episodes.overview: Spike fancies himself a Canine King, holding court until Tom and Jerry revolt!

episodes.name: Planet of Mice
episodes.overview: Tom has a nightmare about a super-intelligent mouse takeover.

episodes.name: Ball of Fun
episodes.overview: Jerry inherits a hamster ball.

episodes.name: Big Apple
episodes.overview: An epic chase through NYC turns into a musical tribute to the city.

episodes.name: Flamingo A-Go-Go
episodes.overview: At the Zoo, a flock of flamingoes protects Jerry and Tuffy from Tom.
